steps.name: Given User launches the Flipkart website in respective "chrome" environment
When User searches for the "Samsung galaxy F05" in the Search bar.
Then User select the "SAMSUNG Galaxy F05 (Twilight Blue, 64 GB)" from the search results.

steps.name: And User switches the tab for the product detail page.
And User click on Add to Bag
Then User verifies that "SAMSUNG Galaxy F05 (Twilight Blue, 64 GB)" displayed in the cart.
